channel.title: Runescape
channel.description: Is it worth playing anymore? I logged on yesterday for the first time in a long time and it looks like a lot has changed. I wasn't on for more than 3 minutes but I didnt see the quest tab?

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:39, topic:475038”]I lost interest when the game’s economy started to fail. With the grand exchange and merchanting clans forming trusts with each other, they basically turned a simple player owned economy into a giant Ponzi scheme. There’s a reason America got rid of it, it kills the economy and ruins the fun.

Either way, I have no interest in having to upgrade my graphics card to play above 9 fps.[/quote]
The economy was ruined around mid 2008.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I lost interest when the game’s economy started to fail. With the grand exchange and merchanting clans forming trusts with each other, they basically turned a simple player owned economy into a giant Ponzi scheme. There’s a reason America got rid of it, it kills the economy and ruins the fun.

Either way, I have no interest in having to upgrade my graphics card to play above 9 fps.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I played RuneScape around the 2007-2010 time period, so things were much more different, and I actually enjoyed the updates then. I’m not saying the new RuneScape is bad or anything, but I have no interest in where it is going.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

I like the new stances and the way swords and shield go into ur armor

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:35, topic:475038”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=593060.msg4203358#msg4203358 date=1358557293]

Actually you do need to be a member. Even if you are level 126 in F2P and have the best available F2P armor/weapon, you’re doing half as much damage as a P2P lv 90. Also, you only have access to about 1/4 of the EoC skills and only about 5-10% of the overall game.

You can go up to level 200 in F2P as well as in P2P. But, that’s how F2P has been. You always were limited to what you can use and where you can go.
[/quote]Never this bad.[/quote]
Nope. Took me 44 minutes to kill a dungeoneering boss, following the exact same strategies that allowed me to kill the boss in P2P in under two minutes. It’s sickening.
Also I meant the old RS. Was thinking of the old RS combat levels + EoC… You understand the concepts of what I meant

Read full topic

[/quote]
You can go up to level 200 in F2P as well as in P2P. But, that’s how F2P has been. You always were limited to what you can use and where you can go.[/quote]Never this bad.

@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

eyeownyew:

Actually you do need to be a member. Even if you are level 126 in F2P and have the best available F2P armor/weapon, you’re doing half as much damage as a P2P lv 90. Also, you only have access to about 1/4 of the EoC skills and only about 5-10% of the overall game.

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

m0ssyh0s:

In my opinion, to play RuneScape now, you need to be a member and play in full screen, otherwise you miss out on pretty much the entire game. Also, with EoC, that hotkey bar takes up too much space to play in the fixed size client.

Not true at all. Just use resizable, that’s what I use and I am a member.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

Chassy13:

I don’t play anymore, but I spent a lot of time on my old account up until 136. The game just got overall boring and kind of uncomfortable with all of the changes. It’s obvious the game was going to change, but it just began to not feel like RuneScape. The last time I actually had a day full of playing was probably over a year ago now…

Yea it isn’t really runescape anymore. I do though enjoy it. The quests are fun, I am used to the EOC and enjoy that as well. Just give it some time and it may grow on you… or not :s

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @ciaran6889 ciaran6889
item.description:
@ciaran6889 wrote:

Runescape is quite good,the new combat system is way better compared to the old one.The simplicity of the old one made it boring af to train, atleast in this one its less boring.
The one problem I have with runescape is bots, people are obviously gonna bot if jagex lets them and im sure if jagex tried hard enough they could remove them. I quit rs recently because I usta just host only when I was online and then just bot when I wasn’t online.
I don’t think i’ll play again until they remove botting and gambling.They’ll probably take another year or two to remove botting and I don’t think they’ll ever remove gambling.

Read full topic

Well, i guess ill start playing a lot more. thanks for all the answers
if you wanna add me my username is v4gh41r

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

jal knight:

I saw you post about POP but what is it? If its for mems only and actually worth it ill get mems but with so many new things its difficult for me to get “the feel for it” again

Well, saying that you’re able to get the best armor in RuneScape, it’s somewhat worth it but it can take some time to get the armor. And yes, it’s better than the Nex armors. There’s also a new fish that’s the best in RuneScape as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I think Runescape is definitely worth playing. Combat is actually fun for once, skilling is easier, bossing is more entertaining, you can hop worlds instantly instead of waiting 30 seconds, etc. Its great, and while at first I hated the EoC, I really warmed up to it and I’m loving it. Still haven’t tried pking, but combat overall is much more entertaining.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:17, topic:475038”][quote author=xI c E link=topic=593060.msg4186382#msg4186382 date=1356215267]
It’s not worth playing at all, the EoC itself has murdered the pking scene, and I’m betting over half of the population are bots, which Jagex just seems to keep letting them stay.
[/quote]
So you’re telling other people to not play rather than just saying your opinion and stopping at that? Obviously people like the EoC because the old combat system was horrible compared to this one.[/quote]

I believe I just stated my opinion, a major factor of course being the EoC. Obviously older players such as myself loved the old combat because of its simplicity and overall easiness, and despise the EoC.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[/quote]
So you’re telling other people to not play rather than just saying your opinion and stopping at that? Obviously people like the EoC because the old combat system was horrible compared to this one.[/quote]

Ive been playing but barely touched the new combat system. It looks a lot different. I think I like it though. The stances and the way it looks when they fight is a little more ‘real’

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

jal knight:

wait, what do you mean all RS is aggressive? So i can just randomly attack someone anywhere?

All the monsters have aggressive abilities… Meaning I can walk by a Lava titan and he decides to auto attack.

[quote=“jal knight, post:15, topic:475038”][quote author=xI c E link=topic=593060.msg4186382#msg4186382 date=1356215267]
It’s not worth playing at all, the EoC itself has murdered the pking scene, and I’m betting over half of the population are bots, which Jagex just seems to keep letting them stay.
[/quote]
I’m sorry but what does EoC mean?[/quote]
EoC: Evolution of Combat

Read full topic
